body_html:
@colesbury I tried your code but see this error:

[Exit:1] yuandong@devgpu216 rl_pytorch$ python test_case.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_case.py", line 5, in <module>
    mp = _mp.get_context('spawn')
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'get_context'

Do I need to upgrade PyTorch? If so, how to do that?

body:
@colesbury I tried your code but see this error:

```
[Exit:1] yuandong@devgpu216 rl_pytorch$ python test_case.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_case.py", line 5, in <module>
    mp = _mp.get_context('spawn')
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'get_context'
```

Do I need to upgrade PyTorch? If so, how to do that?
